RequestId.description: 阿里云为该请求生成的唯一标识符。

Success.description: 调用接口返回是否成功,true代表调用正常

Message.description: 错误信息, 当success=false的时候, 可以取到message

PageSize.description: 分页查询参数的每页条数

TotalCount.description: 查询结果总数, 即我的工单记录总条数

Data.description: 接口调用成功后，返回的业务数据

Description.description: 工单问题描述, 目前只支持纯文本格式

CreateTime.description: 工单创建时间的时间戳

Status.description:
工单状态, 参考值如下
1, "assigned", "待响应", 
2, "dealing", "处理中",
3, "wait_feedback", "待反馈",
4, "feedback", "已反馈",
5, "wait_confirm", "待确认",
6, "confirmed", "已完成"

Severity.description: 紧急度枚举值, 1 代表一般问题, 2 代表紧急问题

401.errorMessage: You are not authorized to perform the operation.

500.errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your request.

title: 查询工单
